winget install Microsoft.PowerToys --version 0.77.0

# Update PowerToys

list.text: SVG Preview - View SVG files in preview pane

box.code:
# Add prefix to all files
Search: ^
Replace: Vacation_
Result: file.jpg ‚Üí Vacation_file.jpg

# Change file extension
Search: \.jpeg$
Replace: .jpg
Result: photo.jpeg ‚Üí photo.jpg

# Remove text from filenames
Search: -copy
Replace: (empty)
Result: document-copy.txt ‚Üí document.txt

# Sequential numbering
Search: ^
Replace: Photo_<#>
Result: file1.jpg ‚Üí Photo_1.jpg, file2.jpg ‚Üí Photo_2.jpg

box.code:
1. Open PowerToys ‚Üí FancyZones
2. Click "Edit zones" ‚Üí "Create new layout"
3. Choose layout type:
   - Grid: Equal-sized zones
   - Canvas: Free-form zone creation
   - Priority Grid: Focus on main workspace
4. Customize zone count and spacing
5. Drag to resize and position zones
6. Save with descriptive name
7. Apply to specific monitors
8. Use Shift+drag to snap windows
